thread.title: Mahershala Ali welcomes first child with wife Amatus Sami-Karim

author: USATODAY
title: Mahershala Ali welcomes first child with wife Amatus Sami-Karim
text:

Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Mahershala Ali welcomes first child with wife Amatus Sami-Karim Maeve McDermott , USATODAY 5:16 p.m. ET Feb. 24, 2017 Mahershala Ali just became a new dad. (Photo: Jordan Strauss, Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Oscars weekend is just starting for Mahershala Ali, who is nominated for best supporting actor for Moonlight . But Ali already has reason to celebrate, sharing on Instagram that he and his wife Amatus Sami-Karim welcomed their first child together on Wednesday. 
Along with the baby's birthdate, Ali also shared the newborn's name, Bari Najma Ali. 
Ali's full name is Mahershalalhashbaz, and in an interview with Jimmy Kimmel last month about the couple's baby name deliberations, he promised "something a little bit simpler for our child." A post shared by Mahershala Ali (@mahershalaali) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:22pm PST 
The couple, who married in 2013, first shared their baby news in a December Instagram post. A post shared by Mahershala Ali (@mahershalaali) on Dec 1, 2016 at 9:24pm PST Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2lEE1iz NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven. We're sorry.
